articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: Clare Connor says she does not recognise accusations of 'cosiness' in England side
articles.description: Clare Connor, managing director of England women's cricket, discusses the fallout of the 16-0 Ashes defeat with BBC Sport.
articles.content:
Connor reaffirmed her belief in the group of players - but accepted they are still playing catch-up with Australia's superior domestic set-up.
This is despite major investment in the women's game in… [+1396 chars]

articles.author: Tyler Lewis
articles.title: ‘Send him home’: Great’s blunt advice
articles.description: Brad Haddin has urged Australian selectors to send Sam Konstas home to play state cricket if he isn’t in their plans for the second Test against Sri Lanka.
articles.content:
Brad Haddin has urged Australian selectors to send Sam Konstas home to play state cricket if he isn’t in their plans for the second Test against Sri Lanka.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
